# Welcome to My Fall 2025 Portfolio

This portfolio documents my learning journey in the Master of Urban Spatial Analytics course, MUSA 5080: Public Policy Analytics.

## About This Course
Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.

## Portfolio Structure
- **Weekly Notes:** My learning reflections and key concepts
- **Labs:** Completed assignments and analyses
- **Midterm:** Predicting single-family home prices in Philadelphia
- **Final Project:** Capstone modeling challenge
- **Side Hustles:** My personal and undergraduate thesis projects

## About Me
Senior at the University of Pennsylvania concentrating in Urban Studies and Real Estate. Interested in housing markets, transport infrastructure, and public-private partnerships. Taking MUSA 5080 to inform my senior thesis research and to build up a toolbox of useful skills.
